text: Very beautiful place for photo taking.  Saw one wedding couple came to take wedding photo shoots. I believe their photos will be very nice.

This IG-worthy location is situated along Dalvey Road.
The elegant European-looking grand Mansion at the top of the hill let it seems like out of Singapore location.
Very nice location for a memorial photo shoot.
Note: there is no proper car park. Take public transport. Nearest mrt is Stevens (blue line) or Napier (brown line); and walk for about 15 to 20 mins.
Nice place, beautiful buildings are everywhere. I like it.
